QuestData.Title: Decipher the Tome
QuestData.Description: This tome appears to be some sort of history written in a secret Alliance cipher. Althen, the historian in Spinebreaker Post, has studied the Unyielding for some time; he may be able to crack the Alliance code and decipher the book.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Mysterious Tome to Althen the Historian in Spinebreaker Post.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is this? A book carried by an Unyielding spirit? How strange. Let me study it. Perhaps I can learn the history of the Unyielding.
QuestData.RewardText: I have studied ancient history my entire un-life. I have never seen anything like this book. It tells the entire history of the Armory, including events that happened after its destruction. $B$BThe Unyielding have kept their history, even after they had fallen in battle. With this book we will be able to understand the Unyielding and convince them to join us.
